title: [For Beginners] Tackling Toxic Using Keras
description: This notebook attempts to tackle this classification problem by using Keras LSTM. While there are many notebook out there that are already tackling using this approach, I feel that there isn't enough explanation to what is going on each step. As someone who has been using vanilla Tensorflow, and recently embraced the wonderful world of Keras, I hope to share with fellow beginners the intuition that I gained from my research and study.  Join me as we walk through it.
